Arg: %1$s LifeStyle App Profile\ Check your BMI BMI Estimated BMR: Calories to hit week goal: Hikes Calories to hit goal: Upload/Change Profile Picture Steps So Far: Not Activated Your 30 Most Recent Step Logs Welcome to the LifeStyle App Welcome to the LifeStyle App, the app that helps you achieve your goal to have a healthy body and life.

This application can calculate your BMR and BMI, as well as the amount of calories to hit per week so you can lose/gain a desired amount of weight.

To calculate this information, you will need to click on "Profile", and fill out information about you. When you finish filling out the required information, the app will automatically calculate your BMR and BMI indexes, and also the calories you need to lose/gain per day to achieve your goal.

If you tap on “Check Weather Today”, the app will provide the weather forecast in your area. Also, it has the “Hikes near you” and “Gyms near you” options that will provide the location of the hikes and gyms near your current location that you could consider to get some exercise.

To start a Step Count session, all you need to do is to shake your device up and down and it will start the step counter. Whenever you want to finish a session, shake the divide left and right, and the amount of steps and the date will be stored. You can always check your past logs if you tap on “Step Counter Logs”.
